alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Covington; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 26 at 9:16PM CST until November 26 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Escambia County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Conecuh County in south central Alabama... West central Covington County in south central Alabama... * Until 1000 PM CST. * At 916 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pollard, or near Flomaton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Brewton, Evergreen, Flomaton, East Brewton, Castleberry, Pollard and Riverview. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
